Reviews.Title: $69 for a $50 card ????
Reviews.Author: michael hall
Reviews.Content: Why would anybody pay $69 dollars for a card that they can get at a local walmart for 49.95 or call Net 10 and pay 45 + tax???????

Reviews.Title: Net 10 Minute Card
Reviews.Author: Kendra Clark
Reviews.Content: This product was great and had no problems loading it to my account. Bought to start service and all went smooth doing so.

ProductInfo.Features:
Net10 prepaid refill
$50 Air Time
No Instant pin , You may contact us if you required
